Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Pamela J. Cohen "dancin withpam.com"
Reviews.Content: This is the best camera system i have owned.  It is easy to use for beginners and advanced photographers alike.  all the belss and whistles are at your fingertips.  The package came with all of the add-ons as well, carrying case, extra battery, charging system, etc.

Reviews.Title: GREAT ACCESORIES
Reviews.Author: Juan Cadena
Reviews.Content: I rate with five stars bacause the camera canon eos rebel is amazing and the accesories are usefull, thank you.

Reviews.Title: best update for rebel
Reviews.Author: bee f
Reviews.Content: camera and lens are awesome, is my second rebel, but the bundle is not the best choice of the market. i guess you won't use none of the accessories but the extra batt. the tripod is very cheap made.

Reviews.Title: Canon Rebel
Reviews.Author: JESSIE JOHNSON
Reviews.Content: I needed one for school, I know canon is a good product. so I buy one. I love this, everyone who need one. this is a great product to buy.

Reviews.Title: Love my new camera!
Reviews.Author: luvjeepin
Reviews.Content: I am so excited with my new camera.  It really is as easy as point and shoot!  I have not used many of the accessories yet, but can appreciate all the little extras, and not needing to purchase individually, especially the case and extra battery.

ProductInfo.Features:
This Kit includes 12 items all with USA Warranty and manufacturer's supplied accessories
Canon EOS REBEL T4i 18.0 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 3-inch Touchscreen and Full HD Movie Mode (Body) - Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II SLR Zoom Lens -
32 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - Secure Digital USB Card Reader - Universal Memory Card Wallet - Pack of LCD Screen Protectors
Additional LP-E8 Rechargeable Lithium-ion Replacement Battery Pack - Well Protective SLR Camera Gadget Bag w/Pockets & Strap
Full Size 59" Tripod W/Case - Focus DVD Guide to Digital SLR Cameras - Focus Digital Grey Card Set - Focus 5pc Deluxe Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - HDMI cable for HDTV connection - BONUS!! Free 25 Quality Prints
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T4i 18.0 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Zoom Lens + 11pc Bundle 32GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
